read.title: Manage fruition request
read.noPurposeAlert: Your agreement request is active. <1>Create your first purpose</1>
read.noCertifiedAttributesForUpgradeTooltip: Your party does not have the needed certified attributes in order to upgrade to the latest version

updateDrawer.title: Fruition request upgrade
updateDrawer.subtitle: A newer version of the e-service has been released and you can upgrade

eserviceNewVersion.title: The new version of the e-service

meaning.title: What does it mean to upgrade?
meaning.paragraph1: When a provider publishes a new version of an e-service, it means that there are changes compared to the previous one. These changes may be administrative, technical, or both.
meaning.paragraph2: Before upgrading, make sure you have aligned all your systems to the API specification of the new version of the e-service.

updateDrawer.noAttributesAlert: The new request will not be active immediately, your institution does not have all the necessary attributes. You will be asked to integrate the request before forwarding it to the provider.

attachedDocumentsDrawer.title: Attached documentation
attachedDocumentsDrawer.subtitle: Contains all the documentation that you have sent to the supplier for the verification of the attributes

rejectionMessage.title: Fruition request rejection reason
rejectionMessage.description: The provider states their reason for refusing to activate this fruition request. You can always submit a new one

attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.description: All the certified, verified or declared attributes that are required for the use of the e-service are indicated below.

verify.title: Verify attribute
verify.subtitle: With this verification you declare that the consumer owns the requested attribute.

radioGroup.label: When does the verification of this attribute expire?

info.title: What happens when an attribute expires?
info.description: To find out more, <1>read the guide.</1>

revoke.title: Revoke attribute
revoke.subtitle: By revoking the attribute, you declare that the consumer no longer owns the indicated attribute.

info.title: What happens when I revoke an attribute?
info.description: To find out more, <1>read the guide.</1>

consumerNotes.title: Message for provider
consumerNotes.description: If there are any groups of attributes marked with “or”, indicate in this message which of those you want to be recognized, based on the documentation you have uploaded. Enter any other useful notes

documents.title: Documentation
documents.description: Enter all the documents necessary for the recognition of your attributes

bottomPageActionCard.title: Quick publish
bottomPageActionCard.description: Have you entered all the information for this agreement request? From here you can immediately publish a draft, or delete it. If you want to post later, just save the draft above or leave this page

provider.title: Fruition requests
provider.description: In this section, you can manage all the fruition requests you have received from parties that want to subscribe to your e-services

subscriber.title: Your requests
subscriber.description: In this section, you can manage all the fruition requests you have sent to e-service Providers
